trans-unit.source: An MS Build task that generates a temporary assembly by compiling the source files generated by the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: MS Build 工作，藉由編譯所產生的來源檔案產生暫存組件<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Any XAML files generated by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask> are added to the temporary assembly as resources.
trans-unit.target: 所產生的任何 XAML 檔案<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask>會加入至暫存組件做為資源。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the build action for the application markup files which are excluded from the project used to generate the temporary assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來產生暫存組件的專案會排除的應用程式標記檔案的建置動作。

trans-unit.source: The application markup type name is used when generating a project file for the temporary assembly.
trans-unit.target: 產生暫存組件的專案檔時，所使用的應用程式標記型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The application markup type name.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式標記型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the generated assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定產生的組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the compilation target name to build in the generated project file used to build the generated temporary assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在用來建置產生暫存組件產生的專案檔中建置的編譯目標名稱。

trans-unit.source: The compilation target name.
trans-unit.target: 編譯目標名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current project file name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的專案檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The current project.
trans-unit.target: 目前的專案。

trans-unit.source: Called by MS Build to execute the task.
trans-unit.target: 由 MS Build 呼叫以執行工作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the code is generated successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果程式碼會產生可順利啟動。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of XAML files that contain the markup for instantiating the newly generated types, one for each input file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含標記以具現化新產生的型別，其中每個輸入檔案的 XAML 檔案的清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> that represents the generated XAML files.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"> </xref> ，代表所產生的 XAML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory to place the generated files in.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要放置所產生的檔案的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The directory that stores the generated files.
trans-unit.target: 放置所產生的檔案的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the paths to any referenced assemblies specified in the project.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定專案中指定任何參考組件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> that represents the paths to referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"> </xref> ，表示參考的組件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of source code files to compile into a temporary assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要編譯至暫存組件的原始程式碼檔的清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> that represents the source code files.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref>表示原始程式碼檔。
